tool.name: process qseq
tool.description: Given a directory of per-swath qseq files, this script generates a single fastq per lane.
tool.command:
uncompress_tgz.py -i $input_dir -o process_qseq_input; process_qseq.py -i process_qseq_input -o process_qseq_output -r $read #if str($lanes): -l $lanes #end if
#if $bases: -b $bases #end if
#if $ignore_pass_filter: --ignore_pass_filter #end if ; compress_path.py -i process_qseq_output -o $output_dir

param.label: -l/--lanes: the lane numbers to consider, comma-separated [defaut: 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8]
param.name: lanes

param.label: -b/--bases: the number of bases to include (useful for slicing a barcode) [defaut: all]
param.name: bases

param.label: --ignore_pass_filter: ignore the illumina pass filter [default:False; reads with 0 in pass filter field are discarded]
param.name: ignore_pass_filter
